name: Query

commentData.description:
The Query class represents a built query. A built query has been parsed and validated. Do not attempt to create an instance of this class.
You must use the {@link client-BusinessNetworkConnection#buildQuery buildQuery} method instead.

tags.title: classdesc
tags.description: A query represents a built query.
